desc: We are a company that manufactures TV Frames and TV Mirrors.  Ours is a very niche market with only 3-4 ranking competitors globally.  Our markets are (in order of priority to rank: USA, UK, Australia, Canada, South Africa).  We will select the 20 top traffic keywords from our Adwords/Bing campaigns, and we want to rank for all 20.We will ONLY hire a company that can demonstrate a clear strategy of how to rank us, so please research our market and submit a 1-2 page proposal on the approach you will take.Project Requirements -1. Select top 20 keywords from paid search, and begin optimization for ranking in our 5 markets2. Need to rank as quickly as possible, should not be so difficult in a low competition market3. Our top 2 competitors are extremely well positioned, always in the #1 spot, for every related keyword, the goal is to get us into the top 3.  I don't think we will be able to displace the leading company [url removed, login to view]Proposal Requirements -1. Clearly demonstrate a strategy for fast and sustainable ranking in the top 3, explain what strategy you will use to get us there given the few competitors for our search terms2. Clearly explain your ability to give us reporting on the 20 terms in the 5 markets, we will require these reports weekly, and the MUST compare previous week's position to current week's position3. Please briefly demonstrate that you have researched our market and understand it4. Clearly outline you estimated time frames for ranking5. Specify and flat amount to be charged, and any monthly maintenance charges6. Explain how off page, on page, and link building will be used, and any other strategies you have7. *BONUS* If you can talk about how you ranked a similar niche product with low competition quickly, we would love to hear about itContractor Requirements -1. MUST SPEAK PERFECT ENGLISH2. Must be available for meetings during US (EST) hours.We look forward to receiving your proposal.
title: PROVEN SEO EXPERT for low competition niche market - need fast results

desc: Looking for motivated sales people to sell downloadable web design software.Main targets are:- designers- design / web agencies- education (design schools: teachers + students) // with education discount providedThe software is established and has marketing materials.It's a one-time purchase of around $300 (not recurring) so should be easier to sell into this target market as apposed to software with monthly contracts.The hope is that the sales rep gets into a rhythm and is able to eventually sell at least 1 unit per day. For the right sales rep, this should be an easy task.The hours are part-time and working schedule is flexible. Work as much or as little as you like. But hopefully you can establish a monthly target and reach it.We will provide basic training of the pros of the product, and can setup a specific landing page with a discount code inserted to help incentivise the prospect you are selling to. There is also a video and online demo. Plus having a landing page URL you give out will make it easier to track your sales. Sales are done by credit card.It's recommended to approach local businesses near to you but of course however you want to reach out to prospects (phone, email, face-to-face) is up to you and happy to hear your ideas on this. And other locales are fine.Payment can be a base pay + commission. But if the sales rep was confident, a commission only (higher rate) would be attractive to the candidate and provide a nice extra income.Looking forward to hearing from you and we want this to be a win-win for both parties.

desc: LOCAL SAN DIEGO, CALIFORNIA, USA COMPANYONLY LOCALS SHOULD APPLYPosition Title: Social Media ManagerLocation: MUST BE LOCAL IN SAN DIEGO COUNTY / OR / SAN MARCOS AREASCompensation: College credit [MUST be enrolled in college course]Desired Skillsets: Social Media Graphic Design, Journalism, PR, AdvertisingHours Desired: 10-15/weekOverview Storm Brain’s social media Managers are given a unique opportunity to get their hands dirty with actual client work. While their focus will lie primarily within social media initiatives, they will be exposed to all aspects of digital marketing, gaining a working knowledge of how each of the departments work individually and together in order to execute the bigger picture strategy. STORM BRAIN’s social Managers will work directly under the Social Media Manager to assist in day-to-day social channel management as well as content development, influencer relationship building, blogging, and strategic initiatives for clients. As a member of the Storm Brain team, they are encouraged to share ideas and collaborate during brainstorms and strategy sessions.Some of Your Duties & Focal Areas:•	Learn to navigate social channels as a marketing professional including Facebook, Instagram, Youtube, Twitter, Pinterest, G+, LinkedIn, etc.•	Use social monitoring tools such as Hootsuite, SproutSocial, etc. to monitor engagement, evaluate performance and find opportunities for connecting with users in our target demographic•	Understand social personas and relationship-building through social content•	Identify and engage social influencers•	Post, comment and share on behalf of clients•	Create graphic / brainstorm new concepts/marketing-ideas / Build Creative Elements•	Understand the content creation process and execute monthly content calendars•	Conduct daily hashtag research•	Upload and schedule monthly social content•	Write blog posts•	Create quizzes and sweepstakes using third party applications•	Optimize social pages for proper indexing•	Optimize social pages for user experience•	Create social ads on Facebook and Twitter•	Stay up to date with industry trends, reports and changes•	Create graphics for social content•	Conduct competitor analyses across different channels•	Understand the social client onboarding and setup proces, CA
title: Hire a Social Media Marketer
